oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Goat Man
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of the "Goat Man", Charles "Ches" McCartney (1901-1998) with his goats and wagon on Irwin Street. A young boy is also standing with them outside the Ford Chevrolet building. McCartney traveled with his goat cart and traded goods in the 1930s and 1940s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Goats; Goat carts
